title: Resistant Inference in Instrumental Variable Models
abstract: arXiv:2403.16844v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: The classical tests in the instrumental variable model can behave arbitrarily if the data is contaminated. For instance, one outlying observation can be enough to change the outcome of a test. We develop a framework to construct testing procedures that are robust to weak instruments, outliers and heavy-tailed errors in the instrumental variable model. The framework is constructed upon M-estimators. By deriving the influence functions of the classical weak instrument robust tests, such as the Anderson-Rubin test, K-test and the conditional likelihood ratio (CLR) test, we prove their unbounded sensitivity to infinitesimal contamination. Therefore, we construct contamination resistant/robust alternatives. In particular, we show how to construct a robust CLR statistic based on Mallows type M-estimators and show that its asymptotic distribution is the same as that of the (classical) CLR statistic. translated_title: 工具变量模型中的抗污染推断
translated_abstract: 在工具变量模型中，如果数据被污染，经典检验可能会表现得任意。例如，一个异常观测足以改变检验结果。我们开发了一个框架，构建了对工具变量模型中的弱工具、异常值和重尾误差具有鲁棒性的检验程序。该框架基于M-估计量构建。通过推导出经典弱工具鲁棒检验（如安德森-鲁宾检验、K检验和条件似然比（CLR）检验）的影响函数，证明了它们对微小污染的敏感性是无限的。因此，我们构建了抗污染的鲁棒性替代方案。特别地，我们展示了如何基于Mallows类型的M-估计器构建稳健的CLR统计量，并展示其渐近分布与（经典的）CLR统计量相同。理论结果得到了验证。
tldr: 该论文提出了一种针对工具变量模型中弱工具、异常值和重尾误差具有鲁棒性的检验程序框架，通过M-估计器构建抗污染检验，特别展示了基于M-估计器构建的鲁棒CLR统计量具有相同的渐近分布。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a framework for robust testing procedures in the instrumental variable model that are resistant to weak instruments, outliers, and heavy-tailed errors, constructed using M-estimators. It specifically demonstrates the construction of a robust CLR statistic based on Mallows type M-estimators with the same asymptotic distribution as the classical CLR statistic.
